item.title: The Deepest Blue
item.description: [[songs/b/breaking_benjamin/ember/blood.md#face-the-monster-ive-become-vyl-wnanory|Endless summer days]] [[songs/b/breaking_benjamin/ember/blood.md#face-the-monster-ive-become-vyl-wnanory|That I spent with you]] [[songs/b/breaking_benjamin/ember/blood.md#face-the-monster-ive-become-vyl-wnanory|Under the light and shades]] [[songs/b/breaking_benjamin/ember/blood.md#face-the-monster-ive-become-vyl-wnanory|Eons old and new]] [[songs/b/breaking_benjamin/ember/blood.md#face-the-monster-ive-become-vyl-wnanory|Watchin’ the sun go down in the deepest blue]] [[songs/b/breaking_benjamin/ember/blood.
